title: AI Practical Competency Enhancement: Digital Education Design for Circular Economy and Sustainability

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental concepts of environmental sustainability and proficiency in using online learning tools
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more specific strategies for applying circular economy models to language domains (e.g., environmental policy report writing).
Learners conduct analyses connecting circular economy cases with sustainability outcomes in LMS-based asynchronous discussions.
Learners create a corporate-level circular economy implementation plan using digital resources accessible in a smartphone environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
